BotIsNotAMemberOfTheChannelChat: Forbidden: bot is not a member of the channel chat
BotIsNotAMemberOfTheGroupChat: Forbidden: bot is not a member of the group chat
BotIsNotAMemberOfTheSupergroupChat: Forbidden: bot is not a member of the supergroup chat
BotWasKickedFromTheChannelChat: Forbidden: bot was kicked from the channel chat
BotWasKickedFromTheGroupChat: Forbidden: bot was kicked from the group chat
BotWasKickedFromTheSupergroupChat: Forbidden: bot was kicked from the supergroup chat
FailedToSaveCertificate: Internal Server Error: failed to save certificate
FileIsTooBig: Bad Request: file is too big
GroupChatWasUpgradedToASupergroupChat: Bad Request: group chat was upgraded to a supergroup chat
HaveNoAccessToTheUser: Bad Request: have no access to the user
InvalidWebhookURLSpecified: Bad Request: invalid webhook URL specified
MethodIsAvailableForSupergroupAndChannel: Bad Request: method is available for supergroup and channel chats only
MethodIsAvailableOnlyForSupergroups: Bad Request: method is available only for supergroups
NotEnoughRightsToChangeCustomTitleOfTheU: Bad Request: not enough rights to change custom title of the user
OnlyCreatorCanEditTheirCustomTitle: Bad Request: only creator can edit their custom title
PrivateChatNotFound: Bad Request: private chat not found
SecretTokenContainsUnallowedCharacters: Bad Request: secret token contains unallowed characters
SecretTokenIsTooLong: Bad Request: secret token is too long
SenderChatIdIsNotAValidInteger: Bad Request: sender_chat_id is not a valid Integer
TheGroupChatWasDeleted: Forbidden: the group chat was deleted
ThereAreNoAdministratorsInThePrivateChat: Bad Request: there are no administrators in the private chat
UserIsNotAnAdministrator: Bad Request: user is not an administrator
